word_mean: 经固溶热处理的合金时效硬化后，在稍高于时效(低于固溶热处理)温度，进行短时间加热而引起的性能复原的现象。
又称“胶析”。鱼糜或鱼糜制品已形成的凝胶崩析的现象。

sentence.Network_en: a reversion to traditional farming methods
I'm trying to prevent the reversion of my garden to nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 我正在试图防止我的花园返回一片荒芜的自然状态.

sentence.Network_en: There was the prospect of too good a fortune in reversion when Charles married Dina.
sentence.Network_cn: 当查尔斯娶黛娜时,他就期望着有一笔可观的财产可以继承.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting the action of returning to or from a place): from Old French, or from Latin reversio(n-), from revertere 'turn back' (see reverse)

entry.tran: (以前的状态、制度或行为的)恢复，回复
entry.def: A reversion to a previous state, system, or kind of behaviour is a change back to it.

example.ex: This is a reversion to the system under which the Royals were paid for nearly 300 years.
example.tran: 又恢复了旧时的体制，王室就是在这种制度下接受了近300年的俸禄。

example.ex: ...a reversion to the emotions of her baby years.
example.tran: 她向婴儿期情感的回归

entry.def: The reversion of land or property to a person, family, or country is the return to them of the ownership or control of the land or property.

means.word_mean: 1. (law) an interest in an estate that reverts to the grantor (or his heirs) at the end of some period (e.g., the death of the grantee)
2. a return to a normal phenotype (usually resulting from a second mutation)
3. a reappearance of an earlier characteristic
6. a failure to maintain a higher state

auth_sentence.content: This reversion to pre-scientific attitudes is accompanied...by a tremendous wave of nostalgia.
auth_sentence.res_content: This reversion to pre-scientific attitudes is accompanied...by a tremendous wave of nostalgia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This reversion to pre-scientific attitudes is accompanied...by a tremendous wave of nostalgia.

auth_sentence.content: It is a reversion to the worst practices of bad politics of the past.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a reversion to the worst practices of bad politics of the past.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a reversion to the worst practices of bad politics of the past.

auth_sentence.content: If other lenders can get away with raising their reversion rates they may well be tempted to follow.

stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+converted[adj.更换信仰的, 修改的]→adj.不改的, 不变化的

advertise[v.公告,公布;为……做广告 v.登广告]+ment表名词→n.广告;公告;登广告
revers=revert[v.回复到,重议]+ion表名词→n.返回[原状,旧习惯],逆转
ad加强[有"向"之意]+vert转+ise表动词→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
